Package com.jcs.sbs.auth

This package contains several classes responsible for setting credentials and adding authorization parameters.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    JCSCredentials
    Interface that provides access to Access and Secret keys
    JCSCredentialsProvider  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Authorization
    This class contains methods for adding required authorization parameters before sending the actual request.
    BasicJCSCredentials
    This class initializes accessKey and secretKey
    ConfigPropertiesCredentialsProvider  
    DefaultJCSCredentialsProviderChain
    Groups all the providers of ACCESS_KEY & SECRET_KEY
    EnvironmentVariableCredentialsProvider  
    JCSCredentialsProviderChain
    Class to read credentials from any of the available credentials providers.
    StaticCredentialsProvider  
    SystemPropertiesCredentialsProvider
    Class to read credentials from system properties.

Package com.jcs.sbs.auth Description

This package contains several classes responsible for setting credentials and adding authorization parameters.
